changeSet.author: Bethany Armitage
changeSet.createView: select e.id, first_name, last_name, email, is_manager, birth_date, max_hrs_week, phone_number, clock_number, pid as positions, history, min_hrs_week, 'mon,' || mon || ' tue,' || tue || ' wed,' || ' thu,' || thu || ' fri,' || fri || ' sat,' || sat || ' sun,' || sun as avail from employee e inner join employee_history_view h on e.id = h.id inner join employee_position_view p on e.id = p.id inner join employee_avail_view a on e.id = a.id
